posts.post_content:
Can be pretty awesome for UB Control decks. Obviously there may be better options, but it sure is fun... Especially when you curse it somehow THEN swap it. Unfortanutely if your opponent is also running Blue, he can just swap it back... still fun!  
  
3.5/5

posts.post_content: I'm not sure if this is how the rules actually work, but I'd run this with [Helm of Possession](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Helm of Possession). Trade for their creature, then sac newly acquired creature with Helm to get the Infiltrator back. My next upkeep I can untap the helm and still keep the Infiltrator since I am the owner.
posts.html:
I'm not sure if this is how the rules actually work, but I'd run this with Helm of Possession. Trade for their creature, then sac newly acquired creature with Helm to get the Infiltrator back. My next upkeep I can untap the helm and still keep the Infiltrator since I am the owner.
